abstract: The Manhattan Borough president and mayoral hopeful attended two fund-raisers with the actress, his (so far) highest profile supporter.
snippet: The Manhattan Borough president and mayoral hopeful attended two fund-raisers with the actress, his (so far) highest profile supporter.
lead_paragraph: The two distinct groups camped outside the entrance to the Jane Hotel on Monday night - paparazzi to the left, activists protesting the expansion of a natural gas pipeline to the right - would have told anyone walking by that this was not your typical party.

headline.main: For Scott Stringer, a Boost From Scarlett Johansson
